styles.alias: CPU Cores in Running VMs vs. Total Hosts CPUs
Memory in Running VMs vs. Total Memory
Actual Disk Used vs. Total disk size

targets.rawSql:
-- This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores and Physical Memory
-- for the vms in the specific cluster.

SELECT
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    SUM( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
--    SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
--    SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS memory_size_mb,
--    SUM( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms,
    SUM( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
--    SUM( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
--    SUM( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
--    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
--    dc_available_disk_size_gb ,
--    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb,
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_over_commit",
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_usage_ratio",
--    SUM( total_vms_mem )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_over_commit",
--    SUM( mem_running )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_usage_ratio",
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_over_commit",
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_usage_ratio"
FROM (
	SELECT
	    COALESCE(
		tag_name,
		'Unknown'
	    ) AS tag_name,
	    datacenter_name,
	    datacenter_description,
	    COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
	    SUM (
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores,
		    0
		) *
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_sockets,
		    0
		)
	    ) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
	    ROUND (
		CAST (
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb,
		            0.00
		        )
		    ) AS float
		) ::numeric /1024, 2
	    ) AS memory_size_mb,
	    num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
	    num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
	    dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb  AS float )::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb AS float ) ::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
	FROM  v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
		)
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_relations
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
		    AND v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_details
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_details.tag_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    vm_count.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
		                THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    ) AS num_of_running_vms,
		    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
		FROM (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status as vm_status,
		    COUNT( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id, v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status
		) AS vm_count
		GROUP BY cluster_id
	    ) AS num_of_vms
		ON (
		    num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		            0
		        )*
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		            0
		        )
		    )
		    AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                THEN
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		                        0
		                    ) *
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		                        0
		                    )
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    )
		    AS cpu_cores_running,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                COALESCE (
		                    v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                    0.00
		                )
		            )  AS float
		       ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS total_vms_mem,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                CASE
		                    WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                        THEN
		                            COALESCE (
		                                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                                0.00
		                            )
		                    ELSE 0.00
		                END ) AS float
		        ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS mem_running
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
		        ON (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_configuration_version
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id
	    ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
		ON (
		    cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb + samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_total_disk_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            samples.storage_domain_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS dc_storage
		ON (
		    dc_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (
		        v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_size_mb
		    ) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.vm_disk_actual_size_mb) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_id =
		            samples.vm_disk_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.vm_disk_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS vms_storage
		ON (
		    vms_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
--	WHERE $X{ IN, CAST ( v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id AS varchar ), P_DataCenter_ID }
	GROUP BY
		tag_name,
		datacenter_name,
		datacenter_description,
		num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
		num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
		cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
		cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
		dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb
) AS DC
GROUP BY
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb

styles.alias: Running VMS - CPU Cores vs. Total Hosts CPUs
Memory in Running VMs vs. Total Memory
Actual Disk Used vs. Total disk size

targets.rawSql:
-- This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores and Physical Memory
-- for the vms in the specific cluster.

SELECT
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
--    SUM( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
    SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
--    SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS memory_size_mb,
--    SUM( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms,
--    SUM( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms,
    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
    SUM( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
--    SUM( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
--    SUM( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
--    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
--    dc_available_disk_size_gb ,
--    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb,
    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_over_commit",
    SUM( cpu_cores_running )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_usage_ratio"
--    SUM( total_vms_mem )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_over_commit",
--    SUM( mem_running )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_usage_ratio",
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_over_commit",
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_usage_ratio"
FROM (
	SELECT
	    COALESCE(
		tag_name,
		'Unknown'
	    ) AS tag_name,
	    datacenter_name,
	    datacenter_description,
	    COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
	    SUM (
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores,
		    0
		) *
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_sockets,
		    0
		)
	    ) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
	    ROUND (
		CAST (
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb,
		            0.00
		        )
		    ) AS float
		) ::numeric /1024, 2
	    ) AS memory_size_mb,
	    num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
	    num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
	    dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb  AS float )::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb AS float ) ::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
	FROM  v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
		)
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_relations
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
		    AND v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_details
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_details.tag_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    vm_count.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
		                THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    ) AS num_of_running_vms,
		    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
		FROM (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status as vm_status,
		    COUNT( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id, v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status
		) AS vm_count
		GROUP BY cluster_id
	    ) AS num_of_vms
		ON (
		    num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		            0
		        )*
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		            0
		        )
		    )
		    AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                THEN
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		                        0
		                    ) *
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		                        0
		                    )
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    )
		    AS cpu_cores_running,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                COALESCE (
		                    v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                    0.00
		                )
		            )  AS float
		       ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS total_vms_mem,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                CASE
		                    WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                        THEN
		                            COALESCE (
		                                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                                0.00
		                            )
		                    ELSE 0.00
		                END ) AS float
		        ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS mem_running
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
		        ON (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_configuration_version
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id
	    ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
		ON (
		    cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb + samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_total_disk_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            samples.storage_domain_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS dc_storage
		ON (
		    dc_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (
		        v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_size_mb
		    ) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.vm_disk_actual_size_mb) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_id =
		            samples.vm_disk_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.vm_disk_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS vms_storage
		ON (
		    vms_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
--	WHERE $X{ IN, CAST ( v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id AS varchar ), P_DataCenter_ID }
	GROUP BY
		tag_name,
		datacenter_name,
		datacenter_description,
		num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
		num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
		cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
		cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
		dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb
) AS DC
GROUP BY
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb

styles.alias: CPU Cores in Running VMs vs. Total Hosts CPUs
Running VMs - Memory vs. Total Memory
Actual Disk Used vs. Total disk size

targets.rawSql:
-- This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores and Physical Memory
-- for the vms in the specific cluster.

SELECT
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
--    SUM( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
--    SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
    SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS memory_size_mb,
--    SUM( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms,
--    SUM( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms,
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
    SUM( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
    SUM( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
--    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
--    dc_available_disk_size_gb ,
--    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb,
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_over_commit",
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_usage_ratio",
    SUM( total_vms_mem )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_over_commit",
    SUM( mem_running )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_usage_ratio"
--    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_over_commit",
--    vm_disk_actual_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_usage_ratio"
FROM (
	SELECT
	    COALESCE(
		tag_name,
		'Unknown'
	    ) AS tag_name,
	    datacenter_name,
	    datacenter_description,
	    COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
	    SUM (
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores,
		    0
		) *
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_sockets,
		    0
		)
	    ) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
	    ROUND (
		CAST (
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb,
		            0.00
		        )
		    ) AS float
		) ::numeric /1024, 2
	    ) AS memory_size_mb,
	    num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
	    num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
	    dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb  AS float )::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb AS float ) ::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
	FROM  v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
		)
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_relations
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
		    AND v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_details
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_details.tag_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    vm_count.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
		                THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    ) AS num_of_running_vms,
		    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
		FROM (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status as vm_status,
		    COUNT( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id, v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status
		) AS vm_count
		GROUP BY cluster_id
	    ) AS num_of_vms
		ON (
		    num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		            0
		        )*
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		            0
		        )
		    )
		    AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                THEN
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		                        0
		                    ) *
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		                        0
		                    )
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    )
		    AS cpu_cores_running,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                COALESCE (
		                    v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                    0.00
		                )
		            )  AS float
		       ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS total_vms_mem,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                CASE
		                    WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                        THEN
		                            COALESCE (
		                                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                                0.00
		                            )
		                    ELSE 0.00
		                END ) AS float
		        ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS mem_running
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
		        ON (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_configuration_version
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id
	    ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
		ON (
		    cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb + samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_total_disk_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            samples.storage_domain_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS dc_storage
		ON (
		    dc_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (
		        v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_size_mb
		    ) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.vm_disk_actual_size_mb) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_id =
		            samples.vm_disk_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.vm_disk_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS vms_storage
		ON (
		    vms_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
--	WHERE $X{ IN, CAST ( v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id AS varchar ), P_DataCenter_ID }
	GROUP BY
		tag_name,
		datacenter_name,
		datacenter_description,
		num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
		num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
		cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
		cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
		dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb
) AS DC
GROUP BY
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb

styles.alias: CPU Cores in Running VMs vs. Total Hosts CPUs
Running VMs - Memory vs. Total Memory
Actual Disk Used vs. Total disk size

targets.rawSql:
-- This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores and Physical Memory
-- for the vms in the specific cluster.

SELECT
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
--    SUM( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
--    SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
--    SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS memory_size_mb,
--    SUM( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms,
--    SUM( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms,
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
--    SUM( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
--    SUM( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb ,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb,
--    SUM( total_vms_cpu_cores )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_over_commit",
--    SUM( cpu_cores_running )/SUM( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS "cpu_usage_ratio",
--    SUM( total_vms_mem )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_over_commit",
--    SUM( mem_running )/SUM( memory_size_mb ) AS "memory_usage_ratio",
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_over_commit",
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb/dc_total_disk_size_gb AS "disk_usage_ratio"
FROM (
	SELECT
	    COALESCE(
		tag_name,
		'Unknown'
	    ) AS tag_name,
	    datacenter_name,
	    datacenter_description,
	    COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
	    SUM (
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores,
		    0
		) *
		COALESCE (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_sockets,
		    0
		)
	    ) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
	    ROUND (
		CAST (
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb,
		            0.00
		        )
		    ) AS float
		) ::numeric /1024, 2
	    ) AS memory_size_mb,
	    num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
	    num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
	    cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
	    dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
	    dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb  AS float )::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
	    ROUND (
	        CAST (vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb AS float ) ::numeric, 2
	    ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
	FROM  v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
		)
	    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_relations
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
		    AND v4_3_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_latest_tags_details
		ON (
		    v4_3_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
		    v4_3_latest_tags_details.tag_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    vm_count.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
		                THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    ) AS num_of_running_vms,
		    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
		FROM (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status as vm_status,
		    COUNT( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id, v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status
		) AS vm_count
		GROUP BY cluster_id
	    ) AS num_of_vms
		ON (
		    num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    a.cluster_id,
		    SUM (
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		            0
		        )*
		        COALESCE (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		            0
		        )
		    )
		    AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
		    SUM (
		        CASE
		            WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                THEN
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket,
		                        0
		                    ) *
		                    COALESCE (
		                        v4_3_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets,
		                        0
		                    )
		            ELSE 0
		        END
		    )
		    AS cpu_cores_running,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                COALESCE (
		                    v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                    0.00
		                )
		            )  AS float
		       ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS total_vms_mem,
		    ROUND (
		        CAST (
		            SUM (
		                CASE
		                    WHEN v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
		                        THEN
		                            COALESCE (
		                                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb,
		                                0.00
		                            )
		                    ELSE 0.00
		                END ) AS float
		        ) ::numeric /1024, 2
		    ) AS mem_running
		FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
		        ON (
		            v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_configuration_version
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms a
		        ON (
		            a.vm_id =
		            v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
		        )
		WHERE
		    v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.history_id IN (
		        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
		        FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly b
		        GROUP BY vm_id
		    )
		GROUP BY
		    a.cluster_id
	    ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
		ON (
		    cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.available_disk_size_gb + samples.used_disk_size_gb)
		    AS dc_total_disk_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            samples.storage_domain_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS dc_storage
		ON (
		    dc_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
	    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
		SELECT
		    datacenter_id,
		    SUM (
		        v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_size_mb
		    ) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		    SUM (samples.vm_disk_actual_size_mb) * 0.0009765625
		    AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
		FROM v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    INNER JOIN v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.storage_domain_id
		        )
		    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples AS samples
		        ON (
		            v4_3_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_id =
		            samples.vm_disk_id
		            AND samples.history_id IN (
		                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
		                FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_samples a
		                GROUP BY a.vm_disk_id
		            )
		        )
		WHERE
		    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
		    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
		GROUP BY datacenter_id
	    ) AS vms_storage
		ON (
		    vms_storage.datacenter_id =
		    v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
		)
--	WHERE $X{ IN, CAST ( v4_3_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id AS varchar ), P_DataCenter_ID }
	GROUP BY
		tag_name,
		datacenter_name,
		datacenter_description,
		num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
		num_of_vms.total_configured_vms,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
		cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
		cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
		cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running,
		dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
		dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
		vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb
) AS DC
GROUP BY
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb
